index:
Welcome to Emotes Open Collection!

Use the navbar to search, or log-in to upload your own emotes!

The animations are working on every minecraft version with the latest mod.


Emotecraft mod

Emotecraft Wiki
wiki made by KaleKo

Download the mod:
  • CurseForge:
    • for Fabric
    • for Forge
  • Modrinth
  • GitHub


This project is Open Source!
Running an ad-free web service is not free, if you like my work, feel free to donate me!
{$support}
If possible, use Ko-Fi, it takes less fee.

user.edit.name: User name
user.edit.name.hint:
It will be your user URL. For example: emotes.kosmx.dev/u/kosmx
It must be unique.
user.edit.display.hint: Fancy display name, does support unicode 😉
user.edit.email.hint: Only needed as a contact info. We don't verify it.
user.edit.checkbox.hint: It's purpose is completely unknown, apparently it does not do anything.
page.logs.title: How to get game logs?
page.logs.subtitle: Quick guide to find logs for popular launchers
page.logs.desc:
To find the game logs, find your game instance folder ".minecraft", in that there are two folders: "logs" and "crash-reports"
You'll find the requested log/crash report files in those folders.
page.logs.desc.official:
Click on "Instances"
Click on directory icon
you have it!
page.logs.desc.curseforge:
Right click on the modpack
Click "Open Folder"
you have it
page.logs.desc.prism:
Select your instance
Click "Minecraft Folder" (or "Folder" in prismlauncher)
If you see one directory called ".minecraft", enter it
you have it!
page.logs.desc.at: On your instance there is a button "Open Folder", just click on that
page.logs.desc.gd:
Right click on your instance
Click "Open Folder"
you have it!
page.logs.footnote:
If you're missing a launcher, feel free to ping me or create a PR.
I WON'T LIST CRACKED LAUNCHERS
